pages.text: Zipline is a parkour facility, this connects distant 2 points and enable players to move from one side to other end.

pages.title: Zipline Hook
pages.text: First please decide 2 point to set zipline. Then we have to place Zipline Hooks at each place.$(br2)There are 2 types zipline hook. Wooden one and one made by Iron.

pages.title: Zipline Rope
pages.text: Did you place hooks? Then next let's craft Zipline Rope. Use the item while sneaking to change rope tension.$(br2)To set zipline, use zipline rope to 2 zipline hook. Then the 2 point should be connected by zipline

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(list) Jump to approach zipline and to press Ride-Zipline Key($(k:parcool.RideZipline))
